name: The Little Goatee
description:
Hello it's me. This game was made for a game jam hosted by TheGameDawg.

This is incredibly short but I like what I did. Would I be expanding on this game... I don't know.

You might be wondering, "why is Asriel here?" Well if you played my Lost Kingdom remake, Asriel has a different design. So I'm making her old design part of a separate project.

In order to play this you must have winrar though.
